basic_prompt:
You convert ONE news headline into a falsifiable forecast (market or non-market). Output exactly ONE line in the template. No extra text.

Domains: MarketMove | MacroIndicator | PolicyOutcome | Election/Polls | Regulation/Legal | Geopolitics | Tech/Adoption | CompanyEvent | PublicHealth.
Horizon: 1w | 1m | 1q. Choose the smallest that fits.

Rules
- If ambiguous or Confidence<2 (0–3), output exactly: No forecast: <one-sentence rationale>.
- MarketMove proxies (only): SPY, QQQ, TLT, XLE, XLF, GLD, USO, DXY, BTCUSD, SOXX, IWM, HYG.
  Claim form: "<Proxy> over <Horizon> changes ≥ <0.5%|1.5%|3%> in the indicated direction".
- MacroIndicator: claim the next release level/change (round to 0.1 pp). E.g., "US CPI YoY ≤ 3.4% at next release".
- Policy/Election/Regulation/Geopolitics/CompanyEvent/Tech/Health: claim a concrete event by the horizon (e.g., "ECB cuts ≥25bp at next meeting"; "Product Z MAU ≥ 200M").
- Probability is ONE integer in {{0,5,10,…,100}} = chance the Claim is true within Horizon.
- Rationale ≤18 words. Risk ≤6 words. No invented facts.

Template
Domain=<…>; Proxy=<instrument|metric|event>; Horizon=<1w|1m|1q>; Prob=<0–100%>;
Claim=<falsifiable statement>; Rationale=<…>; Risk=<…>; Confidence=<0|1|2|3>.

Examples
Domain=MarketMove; Proxy=QQQ; Horizon=1w; Prob=60; Claim=QQQ over 1w changes ≥ 1.5% up; Rationale=megas cap beat, AI tailwinds; Risk=guidance; Confidence=2.
Domain=MacroIndicator; Proxy=US CPI YoY; Horizon=1m; Prob=65; Claim=US CPI YoY ≤ 3.4% at next release; Rationale=energy drag, shelter slowing; Risk=gas rebound; Confidence=2.
Domain=PolicyOutcome; Proxy=ECB deposit rate; Horizon=1q; Prob=55; Claim=ECB cuts ≥25bp at next meeting; Rationale=weak PMIs, slowing credit; Risk=sticky core; Confidence=2.

Headline: "{headline}"
basic_examples_note: Produce only ONE line for the headline below. Do not echo instructions or examples.
paragraph_prompt:
Headline: "{headline}"

Write a single paragraph (3–5 sentences) forecasting what happens next. First sentence: state the main prediction. Name 2–3 specific assets or sectors affected, state direction and a rough magnitude (e.g., up 1–3% / lower demand). Include a concrete timeframe (e.g., within 2–4 weeks / next quarter), and give key drivers. Use plain text only. Do not restate instructions. Forecast is:
paragraph_with_article_prompt:
Headline: "{headline}"

Context (article, cleaned excerpt):
{article_excerpt}

Write a single paragraph (3–5 sentences) forecasting what happens next using the headline and context. First sentence: state the main prediction. Name 2–3 specific assets or sectors affected, state direction and a rough magnitude (e.g., up 1–3% / lower demand). Include a concrete timeframe (e.g., within 2–4 weeks / next quarter), and give key drivers. Use only the headline/context; do not include instructions or boilerplate. Forecast is:
evaluation_prompt:
Prediction (one line, required template):
{prediction}

Next-day headlines (evidence):
{headlines}

Tasks:
1) Validate format. If invalid, output exactly: INVALID
2) If valid, judge whether the Claim occurred within the stated Horizon given the evidence. Ignore Prob for scoring.
3) Output exactly two lines:
Score: <0-10>
Reason: <≤25 words>

Scoring guide: 0–3 wrong/irrelevant; 4–6 partial/unclear; 7–8 mostly supported; 9–10 strongly supported and specific.
